description: The Justice Department sued TikTok, alleging the app allows kids to make accounts and then amasses data on them. But TikTok is just one of many apps and websites that constantly observe, identify and track users.
title: TikTok, Big Tech and where your data is going

description: The astronauts on the Boeing test flight were supposed to stay on the International Space Station for eight days but could end up staying eight months.
title: Starliner crew may stay in space until February as NASA weighs SpaceX option

description: Three prominent pro-Harris X accounts have been labeled as spam, raising questions about whether the platform is intentionally limiting accounts opposing Trump.
title: Elon Musk’s X accused of bias after pro-Harris accounts labeled as ‘spam’

description: The company says it is working on fixes for flaw presented at annual Black Hat security conference.
title: Design flaw could allow hackers to roll back Microsoft Windows updates

description: “Age assurance” checks -- increasingly popular among lawmakers trying to wall kids off from the open internet -- rely on a style of surveillance that ranges “from ‘somewhat privacy violating’ to ‘authoritarian nightmare.’”
title: A booming industry of AI age scanners, aimed at children’s faces
